title: Illinois Critical Access Hospital Network Endorses Availity as Vendor of Choice for Patient Access Solutions
text:
Illinois Critical Access Hospital Network Endorses Availity as Vendor of Choice for Patient Access Solutions [October 16, 2015] Tweet 
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. , Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Illinois Critical Access Hospital Network (ICAHN) has selected Availity , the nation's largest real-time health information network, as the preferred patient access vendor for its 53 member hospitals. 
ICAHN member hospitals expressed a need to improve upfront collections and enhance patient satisfaction, a critical service as the popularity of high-deductible health plans grows. With Availity Patient Access, ICAHN's member hospitals will be able to obtain accurate information about their patients' financial responsibility before their visit; gain insight into each patient's ability to pay what they owe; offer patients payment options; and improve consistency of communication with patients about their payment obligations. 
"The functionality and ease of use of Availity's Patient Access madeit an ideal and affordable solution for small, rural hospitals," said Curt Zimmerman , Director of Business Services and Development for ICAHN. "The ability of our member hospitals to provide patients with an accurate estimate of cost for services prior to the point of care will improve patient satisfaction and increase upfront collections." 
ICAHN, a not-for-profit 501(c)3 corporation established to promote efficiency and best practice and improve healthcare services, includes small and rural critical access hospitals (CAH) located across Illinois, and comprises more than 10,000 employees, 1,250 hospital beds, and combined gross patient revenues of $2.1 billion. 
"We look forward to working with ICAHN to help increase upfront collections, improve patient satisfaction, and achieve consistent adherence to organizational policies and guidelines for their member hospitals," said Russ Thomas , Availity CEO. "If we can help providers effectively address patient payments at the beginning of the relationship, we believe that they will see improvement in overall revenue management and patient engagement."

About Availity 
As an industry-leading, HITRUST-certified health care information technology company, Availity serves an extensive network of health plans, providers, and technology partners nationwide through a suite of dynamic products built on a powerful, intelligent platform. Availity integrates and manages the clinical, administrative, and financial data needed to fuel real-time coordination between providers, health plans, and patients in a growing value-based care environment. Facilitating over 7 million transactions daily, Availity's ability to provide accurate, timely, and relevant information is vital to the financial success of its clients. For more information, including an online demonstration, please visit www.availity.com or call 1.800.AVAILITY (282.4548). 
About ICAHN 
ICAHN is a network of 53 small rural Illinois hospitals dedicated to strengthening the operations of its member hospitals through collaboration. The organization is composed of Illinois hospitals who have earned critical access hospital designation by the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services. ICAHN is recognized nationally for its work with rural healthcare and administers several state, federal, and private healthcare programs, including the management of the Medicare Rural Hospital Flexibility Grant, the Small Hospital Improvement Grant, and several other grant programs on behalf of the Illinois Department of Public Health.
